autopdex.assembler.user_element_assemble_tangentÔÉÅ

autopdex.assembler.user_element_assemble_tangent(dofs, settings, static_settings, set)[source]ÔÉÅ

Assembly of the full (sparse) tangent matrix for custom user element of specified domain.

Parameters:

  • dofs (jnp.ndarray or dict) ‚Äì Degrees of freedom.

  • settings (dict) ‚Äì Settings dictionary.

  • static_settings (flax.core.FrozenDict) ‚Äì Static settings as frozen dictionary.

  • set (int) ‚Äì The domain number.

Returns:

The assembled tangent matrix.

Return type:

jax.experimental.sparse.BCOO
